程序包 vue

类 ConsoleVue

java.lang.Object
vue.ConsoleVue
所有已实现的接口:
java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer
public class ConsoleVue
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer, java.lang.Runnable
A class of Vue which offers Console View for users
从以下版本开始:
13 January 2021
版本:
%I%
作者:
WU Zhongyang, GUAN Mingjun

  • 方法详细资料

    • getCoordonnee

      public int[] getCoordonnee()
      This method is used for getting the coordinate typed by user.
      返回:
      temp An array[2] consists of the x and y of coordinate.

    • run

      public void run()
      This method will be run when the constructor starts the Thread t. Mainly contains different reactions and hints that should be done or showed after the user type in his commands.
      指定者:
      run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable

    • update

      public void update​(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      This method is used for update the hints showed in the console, when this observer is notified by the Observable Game.
      指定者:
      update 在接口中 java.util.Observer
      参数:
      o - the observable object.
      arg - an argument passed to the notifyObservers
